target: उस लड़की में उसकी माँ जैसी कई खूबियाँ थीं; हल्के नीले रंग की आँखें और सफ़ेद बाल जो नीले धागे से सजे थे. आइस किंग को लगता था कि एक बेटी होने से उसे कमज़ोर समझा जाएगा. आख़िरकार, अभी तक उसके केवल बेटे ही हुए थे.

source: “The only options you have are to kill the child or send it out to the wilderness. This is her punishment for your wrongdoing, Eirwen .” He spat out her name as if it was poison. He always did.
target: “आपके पास बच्चे को मारने या उसे जंगल में भेजने के अलावा कोई विकल्प नहीं है। यह आपके गलत काम के लिए उसकी सजा है, एरिवेन।” उसने उसका नाम ऐसे उछाला मानो वह जहर हो। वह हमेशा ऐसा करता था।

source: Frostfell was not always one kingdom. It was split in two, the North and the South. In the North, the non magical kingdom. To the South, a kingdom full of fantastical displays of power. Due to the North’s greed, the two kingdoms clashed in a never ending war, until the South offered a truce.
target: फ़्रॉस्टफ़ेल हमेशा एक राज्य नहीं था। यह दो हिस्सों में विभाजित था, उत्तर और दक्षिण। उत्तर में, गैर जादुई राज्य था। दक्षिण में, शक्ति के शानदार प्रदर्शन वाला एक राज्य था। उत्तर के लालच के कारण, दो राज्यों के बीच एक अंतहीन युद्ध छिड़ गया, जब तक कि दक्षिण ने युद्धविराम की पेशकश नहीं की।

source: The South was desperate, and their royal family would do anything to stop the bloodshed. They offered their only princess to be queen of the North and bear a son to be the future king. Then, the South would join with the North to make one kingdom. The North accepted, and Princess Eirwen married Prince Akull.
target: दक्षिण की स्थिति बेहद खराब थी और वहाँ का शाही परिवार रक्तपात रोकने के लिए कुछ भी करने को तैयार था. उन्होंने अपनी एकमात्र राजकुमारी को उत्तर की रानी बनाने और एक ऐसे बेटे को जन्म देने का प्रस्ताव रखा, जो भविष्य का राजा बने. इसके बाद, दक्षिण को उत्तर के साथ एक साम्राज्य बनाना था. उत्तर ने इसे स्वीकार कर लिया, और राजकुमारी एरिवेन ने राजकुमार अकुल से विवाह कर लिया.

source: “I beg you, my king, in return for the safety of my child, do whatever you want to me, lock me up, banish me, or even kill me.” Queen Eirwen pleaded, holding her child tightly in her arms.
target: "मेरे राजा, मैं आपसे विनती करती हूँ, मेरे बच्चे की सुरक्षा के बदले में, आप मेरे साथ जो चाहें करें, मुझे कैद करें, निर्वासित करें या यहाँ तक कि मुझे मार भी डालें।" रानी ईरवेन ने अपने बच्चे को कसकर गले लगाते हुए गुहार लगाई।

source: The Ice King looked down at his queen, disgust from his eyes. Maybe, just maybe, he would have mercy on her. The woman who he had been with for twenty-two years, the one who always cared for him at his lowest times, the one who had given birth to his sons.
target: आइस किंग ने अपनी रानी की ओर देखा, उसकी आँखों से घृणा झलक रही थी। शायद, बस शायद, उस पर उसे दया आ जाए। वह महिला जो बाईस साल से उसके साथ थी, जो हमेशा उसके सबसे खराब समय में उसकी देखभाल करती थी, जिसने उसके बेटों को जन्म दिया था।

source: “Very well. The child may live in the palace.” He started, earning a sigh from the queen. “But,” he added. “You will be executed.”
target: “बहुत अच्छा। बच्चा महल में रह सकता है।” वह बोला, जिससे रानी की सांस अटक गई। “लेकिन,” वह बोला। “तुम्हें मृत्यु दंड दिया जाएगा।”

source: A shared look of horror came from the advisor and Queen Eirwen herself. She slowly looked down at the floor. “Yes, my king.” She bowed.
target: सलाहकार और रानी एरवेन के चेहरे पर डर का एक समान भाव दिखा. वह धीरे-धीरे नीचे फर्श की ओर देखने लगी. “हाँ, मेरे राजा.” उसने सिर झुकाया.

source: She flipped to a blank page and wrote the date on it. Under it, she wrote, “5/11/648 -12/13/648.”
target: उसने एक खाली पृष्ठ को पलटा और उस पर तारीख लिखी। उसके नीचे, उसने लिखा, “5/11/648 -12/13/648।”

source: “Reviewing old memories?” Ivory inquired, looking at the old notebook. Kari nodded. “Do you think that they will let you out for Christmas? It’s only a few days away.”
target: “पुरानी यादों को ताजा कर रहे हैं?” आइवरी ने पुरानी नोटबुक को देखते हुए पूछा। कैरी ने सर हिलाया। “क्या आपको लगता है कि वे आपको क्रिसमस के लिए बाहर जाने देंगे? अब सिर्फ कुछ ही दिन रह गए हैं।”

source: Kari tapped twice on the lantern. No, as Ivory predicted. The Ice King never let Kari out, as she was seen as “a flaw” in his eyes. She was born mute and was the only girl in her family, as it was all made up of boys.
target: कैरी ने लालटेन पर दो बार टैप किया। नहीं, जैसा कि आइवरी ने भविष्यवाणी की थी। बर्फ का राजा कैरी को कभी बाहर नहीं निकलने देता था, क्योंकि वह उसकी नज़र में "एक दोष" के रूप में देखी जाती थी। वह मूक पैदा हुई थी और उसके परिवार में एकमात्र लड़की थी, क्योंकि इसमें सभी लड़के थे।

source: Ivory was too, in their own special way. When Ivory came out as nonbinary, it seemed like the world changed too. They were given the jobs that would make them spend time alone for most of the time, as a punishment for being different.
target: आइवरी भी अपने तरीके से अलग थीं। जब आइवरी ने खुद को नॉनबाइनरी घोषित किया, तो ऐसा लगा जैसे पूरी दुनिया ही बदल गई हो। उन्हें ऐसी नौकरियां दी गईं, जिसमें उन्हें ज़्यादातर समय अकेले रहना पड़ता था, अलग होने की सज़ा के तौर पर।

source: They were also forced to work as the princess’ servant. They didn’t mind it much thought, as they got a friend too.
target: उन्हें राजकुमारी के नौकर के रूप में काम करने के लिए भी मजबूर किया गया था। हालांकि, उन्हें इसमें ज्यादा परेशानी नहीं हुई, क्योंकि उन्हें एक दोस्त भी मिल गया था।

source: “It’s your birthday soon, isn’t it?” Ivory asked, remembering that the princess’ birthday was in a few days. Kari nodded, a sad glint in her light blue eyes.
target: "तुम्हारा जन्मदिन भी तो जल्द ही आने वाला है, है न?" आइवरी ने पूछा, याद करते हुए कि राजकुमारी का जन्मदिन कुछ ही दिनों में है। कैरी ने सिर हिलाया, उसकी हल्की नीली आँखों में उदासी की चमक थी।

source: “Do you want to celebrate?” They asked, reflecting on the last time she answered it.
target: "क्या आप जश्न मनाना चाहते हैं?" उन्होंने पिछली बार उसके जवाब को याद करते हुए पूछा।

source: No. Kari tapped out. Ivory knew that it was a hard subject for her. It was the day that she was confined to her room and her mother was banished. Ivory was only a baby when it happened, but they remembered the outrage the servants and townspeople were in. They heard Queen Eirwen was a nice queen, but also weirdly predicted things that would happen.
target: नहीं। केरी ने जवाब दिया। आइवरी को पता था कि उसके लिए यह एक मुश्किल विषय था। यह वह दिन था जब वह अपने कमरे में कैद थी और उसकी मां को निर्वासित कर दिया गया था। जब ऐसा हुआ तो आइवरी सिर्फ एक बच्ची थी, लेकिन उन्होंने उस नाराज़गी को याद किया जो नौकरों और शहर के लोगों में थी। उन्होंने सुना था कि रानी ईरवेन एक अच्छी रानी थीं, लेकिन अजीब तरीके से उन्होंने ऐसी चीज़ों की भविष्यवाणी की थी जो होने वाली थीं।

source: “So… whatcha wanna do?” They asked. Kari looked up at them, teeming with excitement. She handed Ivory a paper. When they looked down at it however…
target: “तो फिर... तुम क्या करना चाहते हो?” उन्होंने पूछा। केरी ने उत्साह से भरी नज़रों से उनकी ओर देखा। उसने आइवरी को एक कागज़ दे दिया। जब उन्होंने उसे ध्यान से देखा...

source: 0430 Itania time. Cohren hated waking up this early. Mainly because it was his responsibility to wake everyone else up in his company. Silently stepping out of his bunk, he put on his combat fatigues, throwing on his assault vest, and packed up his belongings from his locker, being careful with a particular small box. He shoulded his rifle and put his helmet on a small hook connected to his belt. It had all its fixing, respirator, goggles, everything needed. After checking his ammo pouches, he quietly walked out of the barracks, mud and ice squelching under his boots.
target: 0430 इटानिया समय। कोहेन को इतनी जल्दी जागना पसंद नहीं था। मुख्य रूप से क्योंकि यह उसकी जिम्मेदारी थी कि वह अपनी कंपनी में बाकी सभी को जगाए। चुपचाप अपने बंक से बाहर निकलते हुए, उसने अपने कॉम्बेट फैटिग्स को पहना, अपना एसॉल्ट वेस्ट फेंक दिया, और अपने लॉकर से अपना सामान पैक किया, एक विशेष छोटे बॉक्स के साथ सावधानी बरतते हुए। उसने अपनी राइफल को अपने कंधे पर रखा और अपने हेलमेट को अपने बेल्ट से जुड़े एक छोटे से हुक पर रख दिया। इसमें इसका सारा फिक्सिंग, रेस्पिरेटर, गॉगल्स, जो भी चाहिए था वह सब था। अपने अम्यूनिशन पाउच की जांच करने के बाद, वह चुपचाप बैरक से बाहर चला गया, अपने बूट्स के नीचे कीचड़ और बर्फ चिपकी हुई थी।

source: He took a lighter from his jacket pocket and a cig from the other. Lighting it, he took a small drag before opening the door slightly. Over the last week he had to get creative when waking the men and women under his command. He stopped using the preset wake up alarm, half the time it never worked, when all that came from the speakers was a light hiss.
target: उन्होंने अपनी जैकेट की जेब से एक लाइटर और दूसरी से एक सिगरेट निकाली। दरवाजा थोड़ा खोलने से पहले उन्होंने इसे जलाया और थोड़ा कश लगाया। पिछले एक हफ्ते से उसने अपने अधीनस्थ पुरुषों और महिलाओं को जागृत करने का बेहतर तरीका ढूँढ़ना शुरू किया। उन्होंने प्रीसेट वेक अप अलार्म का उपयोग करना बंद कर दिया, क्योंकि अधिकांश समय यह काम ही नहीं करता था और स्पीकर से सिर्फ़ एक हल्की-सी फुस्फ़ुसाहट आती थी।

source: “Waking them up” Cohren turned to see 2nd Lieutenant Nemic walking up.
target: “उन्हें जगाना” कोहरेन ने पीछे मुड़कर देखा कि दूसरे लेफ्टिनेंट नेमिक उनकी ओर आ रहे थे.

source: Before he could answer, the door opened and Harris, Craith, and a few others hurried out, already fully dressed and kitted out.
target: उससे पहले कि वह जवाब दे पाता, दरवाजा खुल गया और हैरिस, क्रेथ और कुछ अन्य लोग, जो पहले से ही पूरी तरह से तैयार थे, बाहर निकल गए।

source: “Yes sir. There should be on their way now, we gave them time to grab rations from the mess” 	At 0500 sharp, Exodus company assembled at the motor pool. Shaw stepped onto a box and began to speak.
target: "हां सर। उन्हें अब रास्ते में होना चाहिए, हमने उन्हें मेस से राशन लेने का समय दिया था" ठीक 05:00 बजे, एक्सोडस कंपनी मोटर पूल में इकट्ठी हुई। शॉ एक बॉक्स पर चढ़ गए और बात करने लगे।

source: “Where are moving out to FOB I-131, fifty miles outside of Ianlos. We are to support the ongoing siege and later attack of Ianlos to flush out the insurgency there. From there we will have a foothold and the base of the mountains” Shaw explained. “Get with your squads and mount up”
target: “हम आईएनएलओएस के बाहर 50 मील दूर एफओबी आई-131 की ओर बढ़ रहे हैं। हमारा मकसद चल रहे हमले का समर्थन करना है ताकि वहां पर मौजूद बगावत को दबाया जा सके। वहां से हमारे पास पर्वत का आधार और एक ठिकाना होगा” शॉ ने बताया। “अपने दस्तों के साथ मिलकर एक हो जाएं”

source: The company dispersed, joining together in their squads and their sergeants had them mount up on one of the tanks. Cohren pulled himself onto one of the tanks farther up on the convoy, joining Nemic, Craith, and two new recruits. Cohren remembered them arriving a few days ago, but didn’t know much about them. Sitting on the side, dangling his legs on the side, he adjusted his pack and radio set, which connected to his earpiece and throat mic.
target: कंपनी अपनी-अपनी टुकड़ियों में बंट गई और उनके सार्जेंट ने उन्हें एक टैंक पर चढ़ने को कहा. कोह्रेन खुद को काफिले के सबसे आगे वाले टैंक में ले गया, जहाँ नेमिक, क्रेथ और दो नए भर्ती हुए सैनिक शामिल हुए. कोह्रेन ने उन्हें कुछ दिनों पहले ही शामिल होते हुए देखा था, लेकिन उसके बारे में ज़्यादा जानकारी नहीं थी. बगल में बैठते हुए, अपने पैरों को लटकाते हुए, उसने अपना पैक और रेडियो सेट समायोजित किया, जो उसके इयरपीस और गले के माइक से जुड़ा हुआ था.

source: “Hey Cohren, does Harris still have Snowball?” Nemic asks as they got settled in.
target: "अरे कोहेन, क्या हैरिस के पास अब भी स्नोबॉल है?” जैसे ही वे बैठ गए, नेमिक ने पूछा।

source: “You mean his chicken he stole?” Cohren remembered the morning they had stolen him from a farm. “Yeah, i'm pretty sure”
target: "क्या तुम उसके चिकन की बात कर रहे हो जिसे उसने चुराया था?" कोहरेन को सुबह की घटना याद आई जब उसने एक खेत से चिकन चुराया था। "हाँ, मुझे पूरा यकीन है"

source: Cohren glanced over to one of the other tanks and spotted Harris with his squad. From the back of his pack he could just make out the movement of a small chicken moving its head around, scanning the surroundings.
target: कोहरेन ने टैंकों में से एक पर नज़र डाली और हैरिस को उसके दस्ते के साथ देखा. अपने पैक के पीछे से वह सिर्फ़ एक छोटे मुर्गे की हलचल देख सकता था जो अपने सिर को इधर-उधर घुमा कर आस-पास की तलाशी कर रहा था.

source: “Yup, he still has him” Cohren answered as the tank's turret hatch clanked open and its commander came into view.
target: "जी हाँ, उसके पास अभी भी वह है," कोहरेन ने उत्तर दिया जब टैंक का टर्रेट हैच खुल गया और उसका कमांडर नजर आया।

source: “All tanks were moving out” The commander started calmly but clearly into his headset. The engines of a platoon of tanks and Strykers roared to life as they started moving forward. The Kronos Cohren was on jolted as its break released and moved forward, getting into formation. The tanks took up a wedge formation as they moved across the Itania plains. The winter storms had frozen over the wetlands and forests, but the mud always remained.
target: "सभी टैंक बाहर की ओर बढ़ रहे थे" कमांडर ने शांत लेकिन स्पष्ट रूप से अपने हेडसेट में बात शुरू की। टैंकों और स्ट्राइकर्स की एक प्लाटून के इंजन जोर से शोर करने लगे, क्योंकि वे आगे बढ़ने लगे। क्रोनोस कोहेरन को झटका लगा, क्योंकि उसकी ब्रेक निकल गई और वह आगे बढ़ गया, संरचना में आ गया। टैंकों ने इटानिया मैदानों में जाते समय एक वेज़ फॉर्मेशन बनाया। सर्दी के तूफानों ने आर्द्रभूमि और जंगलों पर अपनी पकड़ बना ली थी, लेकिन कीचड़ हमेशा रहता था।

source: After around an hour, one of the new recruits, Cohren, remembered his name being Orson, spoke up. “Lieutenant, you’ve been here since the start of the war, right?”
target: लगभग एक घंटे के बाद, नए नियुक्त सैनिकों में से एक, कोहरेन ने अपना नाम ऑर्सन याद करते हुए कहा। “लेफ्टिनेंट, आप युद्ध की शुरुआत से ही यहां हैं, है ना?”

source: “Yup, Operation Firestorm,” Cohren answered. “We thought it would be over in a few weeks, but…we underestimate them”
target: "हाँ, ऑपरेशन फायरस्टॉर्म," कोहरेन ने जवाब दिया। "हमने सोचा था कि यह कुछ ही हफ़्तों में खत्म हो जाएगा, लेकिन...हमने उनकी क्षमता को कम आंका।"

source: The advancement of Humanity never ceased, even for a moment–during difficult times we grow and adapt once again. The cities are as prosperous as ever, and our technological advancement is rising. With our recent discovery of Ignniat, humanity has once skyrocketed past its peak; the greatest has yet to be achieved. This grace of newfound knowledge could only be described as divine intervention - we humanity will be able to grace the gods with our presence in their land in the clouds. Everyone within the company of Karascene has evaluated Ignniat and we sense a large potential within this mineral – worry not, Ignniat has not been evaluated to have any side effects or downsides of being mined, it has a higher chance to–
target: मानव जाति की उन्नति कभी भी रुकी नहीं, एक पल के लिए भी - कठिन समय में हम आगे बढते हैं और फिर से अनुकूलित होते हैं। शहर पहले की तरह समृद्ध हैं और हमारी टेक्नोलॉजी से जुड़ी उन्नति बढ़ती जा रही है| इग्निआत के हमारे नए आविष्कार के साथ मानव जाति एक बार फिर अपनी चरम सीमा से भी आगे निकल गई है; उच्चतम बिंदु तक अभी पहुंचना है। प्राप्त हुए ज्ञान की इस गरिमा का वर्णन केवल ईश्वरीय हस्तक्षेप के रूप में किया जा सकता है - हम मानव, देवताओं को बादलों में स्थित उनकी भूमि पर हमारी उपस्थिति से विभूषित कर सकते हैं। कारासीन की कंपनी में हर किसी ने इग्निआत का मूल्यांकन किया है और हमें इस खनिज में बडी संभावना दिखती है - चिन्ता ना करें, इग्निआत के मूल्यांकन में उसके कोई दुष्प्रभाव अथवा खनन के कोई नकारात्मक पहलू नहीं दिखे हैं, उसमें अधिक संभावना है -

source: A click. It had been reruns of this same stream, the day the world was ruined. Dad always found himself turning the channel off when I was unable to tear my eyes away. The somber face he gave me ensured a gut-wrenching feeling transpiring from deep within – I always feel bad when it plays, but it opens the floodgates to so many memories; granted they weren't very good ones. Letting out a sigh, I slowly rose to my feet, gotta get my mind off things. His saddened mood remained, and regularly I’d try to help ease his mood and at least give him a little bit of joy, but today; I’m tired.
target: एक क्लिक। इसी स्ट्रीम का बार बार पुन:प्रसारण हुआ था, जिस दिन दुनिया का विनाश हुआ था। मैं जब अपनी नजर हटा नहीं सकता था तब पिताजी चैनल बंद कर देते थे। उनका फीका चेहरा देखकर मुझे निश्चित रूप से बहुत अंदर से एक अत्यंत कष्टदायी अनुभूति होती थी - जब जब यह धारावाहिक चलता है मुझे हमेशा बुरा लागता है, परन्तु उसके साथ इतनी सारी यादों की बाढ़ आती है; मानता हूं वे बहुत अच्छी नहीं थीं| एक गहरी सांस लेकर मै धीरे से खड़ा हुआ, मुझे अपने मन को इन चीजों से दूर हटाना होगा। उनका मन दुःखी रहा, और मैं नियमित रूप से उनका मन हलका करने का और उनको थोड़ी-सी खुशी देने का प्रयास करता था, किन्तु आज; मैं थका हुआ हूं|

source: I hold a relatively slow pace as I approach the door, giving a small holler to Dad. “I’ll be heading out for a bit, dinner is in the fridge.” No response. Figures. He usually hears me though, he’ll probably be fine. Slowly closing the door behind me, I let another breathy sigh escape as the door completely shut. Nearly forgetting, I place my hand on the cold, metallic scanner that locks the door. If there was anything this apartment had, it was advanced tech, but then again; most places had notable technology–it had been a long time since anyone had used any other different technology.
target: मैं दरवाज़े की ओर अपेक्षाकृत धीमी गति से जाती हूं और पिताजी को धीरे से आवाज़ देती हूं। "मैं थोड़ी देर के लिए बाहर जा रही हूं, रात का खाना फ्रिज में रखा है।" कोई जबाब नहीं। मेरे पीछे दरवाजा धीरे से बंद करते हुए, दरवाज़ा पूरा बंद होने तक मैंने एक गहरी सांस छोड़ी। लगभग भूलते हुए मैं ने दरवाज़े को ताला लगाने वाले धातु के ठंडे स्कैनर पर हाथ रखा| इस अपार्टमेंट में अगर कुछ भी था, तो उन्नत प्रौद्योगिकी थी, लेकिन फिर; बहुत जगहों पर उन्नत प्रौद्योगिकी थी - किसी ने दूसरी किसी तकनीक का उपयोग किया उसमें बहुत लंबा समय बीत चुका है।

source: The cold, rainy night ensued my long overdue walk–exploring the city of Paltricus was a privilege to those who’d been safe from the mutation via escape, or pure luck. The city night was beautiful, illuminated with vibrant stars that remained for thousands of years. It must be lonely in the great distant sky. Paltricus was a nice place, but it felt more like a cage than a luxurious place of living. Filled to the brim with apartments, homes, and any other building able to hold occupants, most buildings were hundreds of stories tall; thanks to Ignniat. The mineral that appeased technology, and architecture was a great mineral that extended our foundation of life. Public knowledge only knows so much about this mineral though, mainly because mainly because it’s kept under pretty tough wraps.
target: ठंडी बरसाती रात के कारण मेरा लंबे समय से करने वाला वॉक हुआ - पेल्ट्रिकस शहर को गहराई से जानना उन लोगों के लिए सौभाग्य की बात था जो पलायन या किस्मत से उत्परिवर्तन से सुरक्षित रहे थे। शहर की रात सुंदर थी, हज़ारों सालों तक रहने वाले चमकदार सितारों से रोशन। सुदूर आसमान में अकेलापन लगता होगा। पेल्ट्रिकस एक अच्छी जगह थी, लेकिन वह रहने के लिए वैभवी जगह के बदले पिंजरे की तरह लगती थी। अपार्टमेन्ट्स, घर और जिसमें लोग रह सकें ऐसी किसी भी इमारत से लबालब भरी हुई , इग्नियात की बदौलत ज्यादातर इमारतें कई सौ मंज़िल लंबी थी। वह खनिज जिसने टेक्नोलॉजी और आर्किटेक्चर को शांत कर दिया है। खनिज के बारे में केवल इतनी ही सार्वजनिक जानकारी है, हालाँकि मुख्यतः इसलिए, मुख्यतः इसलिए कि इसे काफी अच्छी तरह से छुपा कर रखा गया है।

source: Removing myself from clouded thoughts, I found my way to my favorite coffee spot; most people avoid it because rumors were spread that a lapse was found in the area, which was what society has referred to those whom the virus has infected. This never really disturbed me, I’ve had incredible luck my entire life, plus the owner is a great guy. Who would pass up free coffee in exchange for talks and chats late at night?
target: धुंधले विचारों से अपने आप को दूर ले जाकर मैं अपने पसंदीदा कॉफी वाले स्थान की ओर चल पड़ी; बहुत से लोग इसे टालते हैं क्योंकि यह अफवाह फैली थी कि उस क्षेत्र में एक क्षति मिली थी, जो कि वायरस से संक्रमित लोगों के लिए समाज का दिया नाम था। इस चीज़ ने मुझे कभी परेशान नहीं किया है, क्योंकि पूरी ज़िंदगी मैं अत्यधिक भाग्यवान रही हूँ, और उसका मालिक एक बहुत अच्छा आदमी है। देर रात में बातों और गपशप के बदले मुफ्त कॉफी कौन छोड़ेगा?

source: Walking inside, a loud ring dispelled my discomfort as the aroma of freshly brewed coffee filled my lungs. Anton, the man who owned the store, was of course the person behind the counter – the place was practically empty except for a few people in the back. Approaching the counter, my feet tired from a long walk, I droop atop one of the stools and yawn. I spot Anton bringing the regular thankfully. “Hey Lilith, Long night?” his raspy voice echoed within the fractals of my brain, “Something of the sort,” I replied shallowly, more tired and tired by the second.
target: अंदर जाते ही ताजी बनी कॉफी की खुशबू मेरे फेंफडों में भरने लगी तभी एक जोर की घंटी ने मेरी अस्वस्थता को गायब कर दिया। स्टोर का मालिक एन्टोन ही काऊन्टर के पीछे था - पीछे की तरफ थोडे लोगों को छोड़ कर वह जगह लगभग खाली थी। काउंटर तक आते-आते मेरे पैर लंबी दूरी तक चलने से थक गए थे, मैं एक स्टूल पर धर हुई और मैंने उबासी ली। सौभाग्य से मैं एन्टॉन को नियमित कॉफी लाते देखती हूँ। "अरे लिलीथ, क्या लंबी रात थी?" उसकी भारी आवाज़ मेरे दिमाग के हर हिस्से में गूंजने लगी, "ऐसा ही कुछ," मैं ने सेकेंड दर सेकेंड और थकते हुए उड़ता हुआ जवाब दिया।

source: Ready to fix my fatigue, I took a few sips of the coffee placed in front of me. “Business still down since that sighting..?” I spoke quietly, not attempting to scare away the remaining customers that Anton’s unit had. He nodded, cleaning a glass with a rag – this place is technically a bar, but I never really came for drinks. A few murmurs could be heard from behind, but for the most part, the conversation between me and Anton was held rather short tonight. Waving him a small goodbye, I left the shop; with a little more energy than before.
target: मेरी थकावट दूर करने के लिए मैंने मेरे सामने रखी हुई कॉफी के कुछ घूंट पिये। "उसके दिखने के बाद से क्या अभी भी धंधा ठंडा है..?", मैंने एन्टॉन की इकाई में मौजूद बाकी ग्राहकों को डरा कर भगाने का प्रयास न करते हुए धीरे से कहा। उसने एक कपड़े के टुकड़े से गिलास साफ करते हुए सिर हिलाया - वैसे देखो तो ये जगह एक बार है, लेकिन मैं कभी भी ड्रिंक्स के लिए नहीं आती हूँ। पीछे से थोडी खुसुरफुसुर सुनाई दे रही थी, लेकिन आज रात मेरे और एन्टॉन के बीच का संवाद जरा छोटा ही रहा। उसे अलविदा कहने के लिए हाथ हिलाते हुए मैं दुकान से निकली, पहले से थोड़ी अधिक ऊर्जा के साथ।

source: Wandering the dark streets late at night wasn’t usually the best option, but honestly, it was better than staying in that stuffy apartment; hell most of the time you could hear the neighbors having sex more than you could hear your music. With a quick, breathy sigh, I returned my gaze to the walk ahead–I’ll probably make my way towards Al’s Pawnshop; just a place I find junk that looks interesting, as a pastime. Quick regret flushed over me as I heard footsteps close behind, maybe I'm overthinking it, but nobody hung around this place unless they wanted to get mugged, or beaten up. It was popular for its mafia and gang activities…
target: देर रात अंधेरे रस्तों पर घूमना सामान्य रूप से एक अच्छा विकल्प नहीं था, परन्तु ईमानदारी से, उस घुटन भरे अपार्टमेंट में रहने से अच्छा ही था; ज्यादातर समय आप अपना संगीत सुन पाएं उससे ज्यादा वक्त पड़ोसियों को संभोग करते सुन सकते हैं। एक झटपट गहरी सांस लेते हुए मैंने नजर सामने वाले रस्ते पर फेरी - मुझे संभवत: अल के पौनशॉप की ओर जाना होगा, एक ऐसी जगह जहां मुझे वक्त बिताने के लिए रोचक दिखने वाला कबाड़ मिला। जैसे ही मैंने अपने पीछे कदमों की आहट सुनी, मुझ पर अफसोस की बाढ़ आ गई। शायद मैं कुछ ज्यादा ही सोच रही हूँ, लेकिन लोग इस जगह पर तभी रुकते हैं जब वह चाहते हैं कि उन्हें लूट लिया जाए या पीटा जाए। यह माफिया और गैंग गतिविधियों के लिए लोकप्रिय स्थान था...

source: Stealthily I made my way towards the back of the store, murmurs and talking heard beyond a metal grate which took a few yanks to tear off. Climbing into the vent was the safest and quietest option for me right now; climbing my way through, I’d pick up on conversations and talks between strangely dressed men. I noticed Al inside, chained. Figures he’d get caught eventually.
target: मैं छुप-छुपकर दुकान के पीछे वाले हिस्से की ओर बढ़ी, एक धातु की जाली के पीछे फुसफुसाहट और बातें सुनाई दे रही थीं, जिसे निकाल फेकने में थोड़ा ही ज़ोर लगा। वेन्ट में चढ़ना इस वक्त मेरे लिए सब से सुरक्षित और कम शोर वाला विकल्प था; अंदर चढ़ते हुए मुझे विचित्र कपड़े पहने हुए पुरुषों के बीच बातें सुनाई दे रही थीं। मैंने एल को नीचे देखा, जंजीरों में बंधा हुआ। समझ में आता है कि अंततः वह पकड़ा जाए।

source: Alborn was a great guy, but this looked serious. No need to stick my nose out for someone, especially when they seem like they’ve just gotten into trouble with every authority in the city. Yet, I still couldn’t shake the feeling. Letting a silent sigh escape me, I slowly warped off the grate below, dropping down into the quiet room. “Psst. Al. Al!” I whispered, giving a soft yell at his lack of response. “Lilith? What are you doing here..? You’ve gotta leave, he’ll catch you.”
target: एल्बोर्न बेहतरीन बंदा था, लेकिन यह स्थिति गंभीर लग रही थी। किसी के लिए बिना कारण मुसीबत मोल लेने की ज़रूरत नहीं थी, खास कर जब ऐसा लग रहा हो कि उसने शहर के हर अधिकारी के साथ झगड़ा मोल लिया हो। फिर भी, मैं उस भावना को दूर नहीं कर पाई। एक गहरी मूक सांस निकालते हुए, मैंने धीरे से जाली नीचे की ओर मोड़ी और उस शांत कमरे में उतरी। "शू, एल, एल" मैं फुसफुसाया, और जब उसने जवाब नहीं दिया, तो हल्के से चिल्लाई। "लिलीथ? तुम यहां क्या कर रही हो..? तुम्हें जाना होगा, वो तुम्हें पकड़ लेगा।"

source: No shit, I silently voiced to myself. Attempting to lockpick the chains that wrapped around his arms, voices closed in on our location, the faint footsteps growing ever louder. “Quick! Get back in the vent, and leave. Do not come back. If we meet again, it won’t be in this city.” He said hurriedly, the flash of panic on his face didn’t help my nerves at all. Listening to his advice. I couldn’t bring myself to stay longer. Fuck, Al. I quickly ran for it after exiting the vent; it hurt a bit to lose such an invaluable friend. Were they moving him to the…other city? So many things were flicking through my slightly scattered mind, and most of them were angry but sad. I’d done numerous kinds of research on the outer cities, and the capital of the infected, Alcatraz, which they named after the prison – felt like it fit the name pretty well from what I’d read. Not to mention the unmutated had cut any remaining connecting land with infected land, it was…tragic.
target: कोई बकवास नहीं, मैं चुपके से अपने मन में तगा। उसकी बाजूओं पर लपेटी हुई जंजीरों को ताले खोलने का प्रयास करते समय हमारी ओर आती हुई आवाजें सुनाई दीं, कदमों की हलकी आहट बड़ी बनती गई| "जल्दी करो! उस वेन्ट में वापस जाओ और जाओ। वापस मत आना। हम दोबारा मिले तो यह इस शहर में नहीं होगा।" वह झटसे बोला, उसके चेहरे पर चिंता की लकीर ने मुझे बिल्कुल भी शांत नहीं किया। उसकी सलाह सुनते हुए, मैं और ठहर नहीं पाई। भाड़ में जाओ, एल। मैं तेज़ी से वेन्ट से बाहर निकलने के लिए भागी; इतना अनमोल मित्र गंवाने का थोड़ा दर्द था। क्या वे उसे ... किसी दूसरे शहर ले जाने वाले थे? मेरे बिखरे हुए मन में कितने सारी बातें तेजी से चल रही थीं, और उनमें से बहुत सारी गुस्सेवाली पर दुखी थीं| मैंने बाहरी शहरों और संक्रमितों की राजधानी, अल्काट्रेज़, जिसे कारावास के नाम से नाम दिया गया था - के बारे में कई तरह का शोध किया था और मैंने जो पढ़ा था उसके आधार पर ऐसा लग रहा था कि नाम काफी अच्छी तरह से फिट बैठता है। और यह कि जो परिवर्तित नहीं हुए थे, उन्होंने संक्रमित ज़मीन से जुड़ने वाली किसी भी शेष भूमिक को काट दिया था, यह...दुःखद था।

source: The walk home was quiet, but so loud. The thoughts infecting my brain were booming, and the regret of not having stayed to help flashed over multiple times. I finally arrived home, almost brought to tears by the dreadful walk in the burst of sounds from the clouds above, the thunderous booms were enough to frighten any person sometimes. Dad was already passed out on the couch, some rerun of an older movie, probably 10-12 years old; sighing, I quietly crept my way back to my room. Flopping in the bed, I wasn’t able to keep my eyes open for long. Before long, slumber crept up on me.
target: घर तक का रास्ता शांत था, लेकिन कितना शोर था। मेरे दिमाग को संक्रमित करने वाले विचार ज़ोरों का शोर कर रहे थे, और मदद करने के लिए न रुकने का खेद कई बार सामने आया। आखिरकार मैं घर पहुँची, ऊपर गरजते बादलों के भयानक चाल ने मुझे रूआँसा कर दिया था, गरजते बादल कभी-कभी किसी को भी डरा देने के लिए पर्याप्त थे। पिताजी पहले ही काउच में बेहोश हो चुके थे, किसी पुरानी फिल्म का रीरन, लगभग 10-12 साल पुरानी; एक आह भरते हुए मैं चुपचाप अपने कमरे में चली गई। पलंग पर गिरते हुए मैं लंबे समय तक अपनी आँखें खुली नहीं रख पाई। जल्दी ही नींद ने मुझे घेर लिया।

source: The days rolled past before I could even realize it. It was a few days since Alborn was taken away – to where I had no clue, but I knew he was taken somewhere. Those outfits seemed familiar, but no way was I going to figure it out on the first try. Sighing, I placed my hands on the system in front of me, emanating a red and purple glow – I could hack the security, the place isn’t far, and I doubt they took measures...Maybe I shouldn’t. Of course, against all morals, my fingers moved without my knowing, pulling up multiple screens; god I’m good. I was pretty popular on a couple of websites, they referred to me as “WRAITH.” Which was a pretty catchy name. Granted my name on any site is WR417H, but I like to think the public came up with it.
target: दिन कैसे गुजरे मेरी समझ में नहीं आया| एल्बोर्न को ले जाया गया उसे कुछ दिन हुए थे - कहां लेकर गए इसका मेरे पास कोई सुराग न था, लेकिन मैं जानती थी कि उसे कहीं तो ले जाया गया है। वह पहनावा जाना-पहचाना लगता था, लेकिन मैं उसे पहली ही बार में पहचान पाऊँ इसकी संभावना नहीं थी। आह भरते हुए मैंने अपने सामने वाली सिस्टम पर हाथ रखे जिस में से एक लाल और जामुनी चमक निकल रही थी- मैं सिक्योरिटी को हैक कर सकती हूँ, जगह कुछ दूर नहीं है और मुझे नहीं लगता कि उन्होंने उपाय किए हों .... शायद मुझे यह नहीं करना चाहिए। सहज ही, सारी नैतिकता के विरुद्ध, मेरी उंगलियां मेरी जानकारी के बिना चल रही थीं, अलग अलग स्क्रीन खोल रही थीं; अरे, मैं यह अच्छे से कर सकती हूं| कुछ वेबसाइटों पर मैं काफी लोकप्रिय ती, वे मुझे "रैथ" कहते थे, जो कि एक काफी आकर्षक नाम है। हालांकि किसी भी साइट पर मेरा नाम WR417H हैं, मैं यह सोचना पसंद करती हूँ कि लोगों ने इसे सोचा है।

source: Moving the surveillance onto my mobile device, I watched each one intently. Nothing. It was like they were never there. That makes no sense. Cameras had tight security, even with remote access. How..? ARGH. I stood angrily, ready to remove some thoughts from my head – I made my way over, sliding on shoes and taking my keys. “I’ll be back soon, Dad.”Silence. Whatever, he didn’t usually respond, he was probably busy doing something more important than me anyway.
target: सर्वेलन्स को अपने मोबाइल डिवाइस पर हटाते हुए, मैं प्रत्येक को ध्यान से देख रही थी। कुछ भी नहीं। ऐसा लग रहा था, जैसे वे कभी वहां थे ही नहीं। कैमरा पर कड़ी सिक्योरिटी थी, रिमोट ऐक्सेस के साथ भी। कैसे..? ऊफ। मैं गुस्से में खड़ी थी, अपने दिमाग से कुछ विचार हटाने को तैयार - मैं वहाँ पहुँची, जूते पहने रऔर अपनी चाबियां लीं। "मैं जल्दी वापस आऊंगी, पिताजी।" मौन। जो भी हो, सामन्यात: वे जवाब नहीं देते थे, शायद वैसे भी मुझसे ज्यादा महत्वपूर्ण कुछ करने में व्यस्त थे।

source: With a quick jolt, I felt a shiver enthrall its way down my spine as I made my way out of the apartment; weird. Ignoring the feeling, I urged myself to head towards Al’s to investigate a little, but my legs moved towards Anton’s small bar – it was a pretty calm place, and I definitely needed to talk to someone. Who better than a bartender who owes you something?
target: एक तेज झटके के साथ, जैसे ही मैं अपार्टमेंट से बाहर निकाली, मुझे अपनी रीढ़ में से एक सरसराहट सी महसूस हुई; अजीब बात है| इस एहसास पर ध्यान न देते हुए, मैंने थोड़ी-सी जांच करने के लिए अल के वहां जाने के लिए अपनेआप को मनाया, परन्तु मेरे पैर एन्टोन के छोटे बार की ओर मुड़े - वह एक काफी शांत जगह थी, और मुझे किसीसे तो बात करनी ही थी। जिस पर आपका कर्ज़ हो उस बार टेन्डर से बेहतर कौन हो सकता है?

source: Irregularly, Anton’s was pretty busy; it was bustling with activity and new faces that I’ve never seen before – Anton was regularly the only worker, so knowing that he must be pretty stressed. “Hey Barkeep, get me a coffee.” I purposely spoke in a lower tone to throw him off a bit, a small chuckle escaping me seeing his sigh of relief after turning quickly. “God, Lilith, don’t do that to me…” he softly let out, obviously tired. “You seem pretty busy…you need some help? Look’s like there's more than plenty of folks here.” I huffed out, I do not want to help with these drunks, but I feel bad making this guy work alone out here. “Could you? I’ll pay you after…” he uttered with the eyes of a puppy, aimed straight at me. Advanced War Tactics…
target: कभी कभी एन्टोन बहुत व्यस्त होता था; वहां कुछ न कुछ चलता रहता था और मैंने कभी न देखे हुए नए चेहरे दिखते थे - एन्टोन नियमित रूप से इकलौता कर्मचारी था, तो ज़ाहिर था कि उस पर बड़ा बोझ था। "ए बारकीप, मेरे लिए एक कॉफी लाओ।" उसको थोड़ा चौंकाने के लिए मैं जानबूझ कर धीमी आवाज में बोली, उसे झट से पीछे मुड़कर राहत की एक गहरी सांस लेते हुए देखकर मैं मुंह दबाकर हंसी। "ए लिलिथ, मेरे साथ ऐसा मत करो..." उसने धीरे से कहा, स्पष्ट था कि वह थका हुआ था। "तुम बहुत व्यस्त दिख रहे हो... क्या तुम्हें थोड़ी मदद चाहिए? लगता है यहाँ बहुत से भी ज्यादा लोग हैं।" मैंने चिढ़ाया, मुझे इन पियक्कडों के साथ मदद नहीं करनी है, लेकिन मुझे बुरा लग रहा है कि ये बंदा यहां अकेला काम कर रहा है। "कर सकती हो? मैं तुम्हें बाद में पैसे दे दूंगा ..." मेरे सामने लक्षित प्यारी सी आँखों के साथ वह बोला। युद्ध के उन्नत कौशल....

source: A burst of flames erupted from Thassalin's jaws as the colossal Thraki set fire to a very specific patch of forest, then circled above, watching for moment. Weirdly, as he had slowed down, the weird screaming noise from behind him had stopped. Thassalin had forgotten he had passengers on his back.
target: विशाल थ्राकी ने जंगल के एक विशिष्ट भाग को जैसे ही आग लगाई थसालीन के जबड़े में से तेजी से ज्वालाएं भडक उठीं, फिर वो पलभर देखते हुए ऊपर गोल गोल घूमता रहा। अजीब बात थी कि जैसे ही उसकी गति धीमी हुई उसके पीछे होनेवाला विचित्र चिल्लाने का शोर बंद हो गया था। थसालीन भूल गया था कि उसकी पीठ पर यात्री थे।

source: "My own flight is very different from being abruptly dragged off by a massive, pink dragon!"
target: मेरी अपनी उड़ान किसी विशाल, गुलाबी ड्रैगन के द्वारा एकाएक खींचकर ले जाए जाने से बहुत अलग है!

source: Kayel clearly didn't agree with Nyssi, he looked less black than normal and his claws had dug into Thassalin's back to the point that he'd made the Thraki bleed, but Thassalin clearly didn't seem to care. That being said, Thassalin had realized he had scared his new friends and found a clearing to land in.
target: कायल स्पष्ट रूप से नियसी से सहमत नहीं था, वह सामान्य से कम काला दिख रहा था और उसके पंजे थसालीन की पीठ में इतनी हद तक दबाए हुए थे कि थ्राकी से खून बहने लगा, लेकिन स्पष्ट रूप से थसालीन को कोई चिंता नहीं थी| फिर भी, थसालीन को एहसास हुआ कि उसने अपने नए दोस्तों को डराया था और नीचे उतरने के लिए उसने एक खाली जगह खोज ली।

source: "I APOLOGIZE BUT I PICKED UP A SCENT. I HAD TO DEAL WITH IT!"
target: मैं क्षमा मांगता हुं, लेकिन मुझे एक सुराग मिला। मुझे उससे निपटना ही था।

source: "Did you have to drag us along as well?" Tenuk snapped as he climbed off Thassalin's back, sliding down his tail. "And we left Retvik behind! We abandoned our big, strong, fighty guy! How is he going to get to us?"
target: तुम्हें क्या हमें भी साथ में खींचके ले जाना था? तेनुक थसालीन की पूंछ पर से फिसलकर उसकी पीठ से नीचे उतरते हुए गुस्से से बोला| "और हमने रेत्विक को पीछे छोड़ा! हमने हमारे बड़े, शक्तिशाली योद्धा मित्र को छोड़ दिया! वो हम तक कैसे पहुंचेगा?"

source: "He'll work it out..." Nyssi tutted. "Retvik's slow but he's not stupid."
target: वो कुछ ना कुछ करेगा ... नियासी ने नापसंदगी दिखाई। " रेत्विक धीमा जरूर है, पर मूर्ख नहीं।"

source: Nyssi blinked and turned back to Tenuk. "Of course he can drive."
target: नियासी ने पलकें झपकाईं और फिर से तेनुक की ओर मुड़ीय़ "बिल्कुल चला सकता है वो गाड़ी।"

source: No, clearly not. The creature just hissed and tried to fly directly into Thassalin. Thankfully, despite his size, Thassalin was nimble enough to get out of the way, but Nyssi couldn't help but scream as she very nearly lost her grip on Thassalin's overly smooth scales.
target: नहीं, स्पष्ट रूप से नहीं। वो जानवर केवल फुफकार रहा था और सीधे थसालीन में उड़ने का प्रयास कर रहा था। अच्छी बात यह थी कि थसालीन अपने आकार के बावजूद इतना चपल था कि रास्ते से निकल पाए, लेकिन थसालीन की पूर्णत: मुलायम शल्कों पर से नियासी की पकड़ लगभग छूटी तो वह अपने आप को चीखने से रोक नहीं पाई।

source: Thassalin hissed, then circled round, closer to the mountain he called home. The dark beast followed, but somewhat panicked as a blast of fire hit it from behind. The creature hadn't realised it was no longer alone. It panicked further as Thassalin slowed down then thwacked his tail into the side of the beast's head, knocking it off course.
target: थसालीन फुफकारा, फिर गोल घूमा उस पहाड़ के समीप जिसे वह घर कहता था। वह काला जानवर उसके पीछे गया, लेकिन जैसे ही उसके पीछे से अचानक आग का झोंका आया वो घाबरा गया। वह और भी घबराया क्योंकि थासालीन धीमा हुआ और फिर उसने जानवर के सिर के बाजू में अपनी पूंछ ठोक कर उसे अपने पथ से भ्रष्ट कर दिया।

source: Snarling and hissing, the creature flew upwards, spitting into the air. Everything suddenly went dark, as if the monster was sucking the light from the sky itself, replacing it with a cloud of perpetual night.
target: गुरगुराते और फुफकारते हुए, वह जानवर ऊपर की ओर उड़ा, हवा में घुरघुराया। अचानक चारों ओर अंधेरा छा गया, जैसे कि राक्षस आसमान में से रोशनी को चूस रहा था, और उसकी जगह निरंतर रात का बादल छा गया।

source: No longer able to see, Thassalin tried to retreat, but found himself scraping against the top of the treeline, before crashing into a clearing. The creature seemed to know exactly where Thassalin had fallen and headed straight for him, taking the dark cloud with it.
target: थासालीन को अब दिख नहीं रहा था और उसने पीछे हटने का प्रयास किया, लेकिन वह वृक्षारेखा की चोटी पर खरोंचता गया और एक खुली जगह पर गिर गया। ऐसे लग रहा था कि उस प्राणी को पता था कि थसालीन कहां गिरा है और वह अपने साथ वह काला बादल लेकर उस पर वार करने चला।

source: "Kayel!" Tenuk exclaimed as he glided out of the cloud and began circling, trying to spot Nyssi and Thassalin in the darkness below. "What do we do? Kayel..? Kayel, where are you?"
target: कायेल! बादल में से फिसलते हुए तेनुक चिल्लाया और नीचे अंधेरे में नियासी और थसालीन को खोजने का प्रयास करते करते गोल गोल घूमने लगा। "हम क्या करें? कायेल..? कायेल, कहां हो तुम?"

source: Below, Nyssi scrambled to her feet. She was pretty sure she had broken something, but her weird, unnatural healing powers had already kicked in. The same couldn't have been said for Thassalin, who was lying in a lump, resting against the one tree that hadn't collapsed under his weight. Nyssi did her best to try and reach Thassalin but she could barely see more than a couple of meters in front of her. Everything was pitch black and engulfed in unholy shadows. And in said shadows, something was screaming and screeching.
target: नीचे, नियासी किसी तरह खड़ी हुई। उसको पक्का पता था कि उसका कुछ तो टूटा था, लेकिन उसकी विचित्र, अप्राकृतिक उपराचात्मक शक्तियां पहले से ही काम कर रही थीं। यही थसालीन के लिए नहीं कहा जा सकता था, वह एक ढेर में पड़ा था, एक ऐसे पेड़ के सहारे, जो उसके वजन से गिरा नहीं था। नियासी ने थसालीन तक पहुंचने की हर कोशिश की, पर उसे अपने आगे थोड़े मीटर से अधिक अंतर पर कुछ नहीं दिख रहा था। सबकुछ एकदम काला था और अशुद्ध परछाईयों से घिरा था। और उन परछाइयों में कुछ चीख और चिल्ला रहा था।

source: A horrible, clubbed tail smashed into the ground near Nyssi, knocking her over. She noticed though that the tail was flailing, not aiming at her. The creature, what little Nyssi could see and hear of it, was snarling and clawing at the shadows it had created. Something was teleporting through the darkness, stabbing at the monster, confusing it.
target: एक भयानक, गदा जैसी पूंछ नियासी के पास ज़मीन पर ज़ोर से गिरी, जिससे नियासी गिर पड़ी। लेकिन उसने देखा कि पूंछ हिल रही थी, पर उस पर निशाना साधे हुए नहीं थी। नियासी जो कुछ भी थोडा देख-सुन सकती थी, उसमें वो प्राणी गुर्रा रहा था और उसी ने बनाई हुई परछाइयों पर गुर्रा रहा था और पंजे मार रहा था। अंधेरे में से कुछ प्रकट हो रहा था, गायब हो रहा था, उस राक्षस पर प्रहार कर रहा था, और उसे भ्रमित कर रहा था।

source: “Please!” Queen Eirwen begged, “don’t send her away! She’s just a child!” The Ice King looked down at his wife from his throne, his royal advisor next to him. She had given birth to a girl. He scowled at the thought.
target: "कृपा करें!" रानी आयर्वेन ने प्रार्थना की, "उसे दूर मत भेजिए! वह अभी छोटी बच्ची है!" बर्फ के राजा ने अपने सिंहासन से अपनी पत्नी की ओर नीचे देखा, उसका शाही सलाहकार उसके पास बैठा था। रानी ने एक लडकी को जन्म दिया था। इस विचार से राजा ने भौंहें चढ़ाईं।

source: The girl in question looked a lot like her mother; pale blue eyes and white hair decorated with blue strands. The Ice King thought a daughter made him look weak. After all, he had only had sons up until this point.
target: जिसकी बात हो रही थी वह लड़की बहुत कुछ अपनी माँ जैसी ही दिखती थी; हल्की नीली आँखें और नीली लटों से सजे सफेद बाल। बर्फ के राजा ने सोचा कि बेटी के होने से वह कमज़ोर लगेगा। आखिरकार अब तक उसके सिर्फ बेटे ही थे।

source: “The only options you have are to kill the child or send it out to the wilderness. This is her punishment for your wrongdoing, Eirwen .” He spat out her name as if it was poison. He always did.
target: "तुम्हारे पास दो ही विकल्प हैं - या तो बच्ची को मार दो या उसे जंगल में भिजवा दो। यह तुम्हारे दुराचार के लिए उसकी सज़ा है, आयर्वेन।" उसने रानी का नाम ऐसी घृणा से लिया जैसे वह कोई विष हो। वह हमेशा ऐसे ही करता था।

source: Frostfell was not always one kingdom. It was split in two, the North and the South. In the North, the non magical kingdom. To the South, a kingdom full of fantastical displays of power. Due to the North’s greed, the two kingdoms clashed in a never ending war, until the South offered a truce.
target: फ्रोस्टफेल हमेशा एक साम्राज्य नहीं था। वह दो में बटा हुआ था, उत्तर और दक्षिण। उत्तर में गैर जादुई राज्य था। दक्षिण में, शक्तियों के अद्भुत प्रदर्शनों से भरा हुआ एक साम्राज्य। उत्तर की लालच के कारण दोनों साम्राज्यों में एक कभी ना रुकने वाला युद्ध छिड़ा, जब तक दक्षिण ने युद्ध विराम का प्रस्ताव नहीं रखा था।

source: The South was desperate, and their royal family would do anything to stop the bloodshed. They offered their only princess to be queen of the North and bear a son to be the future king. Then, the South would join with the North to make one kingdom. The North accepted, and Princess Eirwen married Prince Akull.
target: दक्षिण हताश था और उनका राजवी परिवार रक्तपात को रोकने के लिए कुछ भी करने को तैयार था। उन्होंने अपनी इकलौती बेटी को उत्तर की रानी बन कर भावी राजा को को जन्म देने के लिए प्रस्तावित किया। फिर, दक्षिण उत्तर से जुड़ कर उन्हें एक राज्य बना देगा। उत्तर ने यह स्वीकार किया, और राजकुमारी आयर्वेन ने राजकुमार अकुल से शादी कर ली।

source: “I beg you, my king, in return for the safety of my child, do whatever you want to me, lock me up, banish me, or even kill me.” Queen Eirwen pleaded, holding her child tightly in her arms.
target: "मैं आपसे भीख मांगती हूं, मेरे नरेश, मेरी बच्ची की सुरक्षा के बदले आप मेरे साथ जो चाहें करें, मुझे ताले मे बंद रखें, मुझे निर्वासित करें, या मार भी डालें।" रानी आयर्वेन अपनी बच्ची को अपने हाथों में कसके पकड़े हुए गिडगिडाई|

source: The Ice King looked down at his queen, disgust from his eyes. Maybe, just maybe, he would have mercy on her. The woman who he had been with for twenty-two years, the one who always cared for him at his lowest times, the one who had given birth to his sons.
target: बर्फ के राजा ने अपनी रानी की तरफ देखा, उसकी आंखों में घृणा थी| हो सकता है, शायद ही, उसको रानी की दया आए। जिस स्त्री के साथ वह बाइस वर्ष रहा था, जिस स्त्री ने उसके खराब समय में हमेशा उसका साथ दिया था, जिसने उसके बेटों को जन्म दिया था।

source: “Very well. The child may live in the palace.” He started, earning a sigh from the queen. “But,” he added. “You will be executed.”
target: "ठीक है। बच्ची राजमहल में रह सकती है।" उसने रानी को आह भरते हुए सुना, "लेकिन," उसने आगे कहा, "तुम्हें मृत्युदंड दिया जाएगा।"

source: A shared look of horror came from the advisor and Queen Eirwen herself. She slowly looked down at the floor. “Yes, my king.” She bowed.
target: सलाहकार और स्वयं रानी आयर्वेन, दोनों के चेहरों पर एक भय की लहर आ गई। उसने धीरे से ज़ीमन की ओर देखा। "जी, मेरे नरेश।" रानी ने नमन किया।

source: She flipped to a blank page and wrote the date on it. Under it, she wrote, “5/11/648 -12/13/648.”
target: उसने एक रिक्त पन्ना खोला और उसपर तारीख लिखी। उसके नीचे उसने लिखा, "5/11/648-12/13/648।"

source: “Reviewing old memories?” Ivory inquired, looking at the old notebook. Kari nodded. “Do you think that they will let you out for Christmas? It’s only a few days away.”
target: "पुरानी यादें दोहरा रही हो?" पुरानी कापी देखते हुए आइवरी ने पूछा। कारी ने सिर हिलाकर हामी भरी।"क्या तुम्हें लगता है कि वे तुम्हें क्रिसमस के लिए बाहर निकालेंगे? वो तो थोड़े ही दिनों में है।"

source: Kari tapped twice on the lantern. No, as Ivory predicted. The Ice King never let Kari out, as she was seen as “a flaw” in his eyes. She was born mute and was the only girl in her family, as it was all made up of boys.
target: कारी ने लालटेन को दो बार थपथपाया। नहीं, जैसे आइवरी का पूर्वानुमान था। बर्फ के राजा कारी को कभी भी बाहर आने नहीं देते थे, क्योंकि उनकी नजर में कारी "एक कलंक" थी। वो गूंगी पैदा हुई थी और उसके परिवार में अकेली लडकी थी, क्योंकि परिवार में सारे लडके ही थे।

source: Ivory was too, in their own special way. When Ivory came out as nonbinary, it seemed like the world changed too. They were given the jobs that would make them spend time alone for most of the time, as a punishment for being different.
target: आइवरी भी, अपने खास तरीके से। जब आइवरी नॉन बायनरी के रूप में प्रकट हुए, तब ऐसा लगा कि दुनिया भी बदल गई। उन्हें ऐसे काम दिए जाते थे जिससे ज्यादातर वे अकेले ही वक्त बिताएं, अलग होने के की एक सज़ा के रूप में।

source: They were also forced to work as the princess’ servant. They didn’t mind it much thought, as they got a friend too.
target: राजकुमारी के सेवक के रूप में काम करने के लिए भी उन पर जबरदस्ती की गई थी। इससे उन्हें ज्यादा समस्या नहीं थी, क्योंकि उन्हें एक दोस्त भी मिली थी।

source: “It’s your birthday soon, isn’t it?” Ivory asked, remembering that the princess’ birthday was in a few days. Kari nodded, a sad glint in her light blue eyes.
target: "अब जल्दी ही आपका जन्मदिवस है, है ना? आइवरी ने पूछा, उनको याद आया कि राजकुमारी का जन्मदिवस थोड़े ही दिनों में था। कारी ने सिर हिलाकर हामी भरी, उसकी हल्की नीली आंखों में उदासी की झलक थी।

source: “Do you want to celebrate?” They asked, reflecting on the last time she answered it.
target: "आप मनना चाहती हैं?" उसने पिछली बार जो जवाब दिया था उस पर विचार करते हुए उन्होंने पूछा।

source: No. Kari tapped out. Ivory knew that it was a hard subject for her. It was the day that she was confined to her room and her mother was banished. Ivory was only a baby when it happened, but they remembered the outrage the servants and townspeople were in. They heard Queen Eirwen was a nice queen, but also weirdly predicted things that would happen.
target: नहीं, कारी ने टैप किया। आइवरी को पता था कि यह उसके लिए कठिन विषय था। यह वही दिन था जब उसको उसके कमरे में बंद कर दिया गया था और उसकी मां को निर्वासित कर दिया था। इस घटना के समय आइवरी तो एक बच्चे थे, लेकिन उनको नौकरों और ग्रामवासियों का क्रोध याद था। उन्होंने सुना था की रानी आयर्वेन एक अच्छी रानी थी, और अजीब तरह से होने वाली बातों का पूर्वानुमान कर सकती थी।

source: “So… whatcha wanna do?” They asked. Kari looked up at them, teeming with excitement. She handed Ivory a paper. When they looked down at it however…
target: " तो.... क्या करना है?" उन्होंने पूछा। कारी ने उनकी ओर देखा, उसमें उमंग भरी थी। उसने आइवरी को एक कागज़ दिया। पर जब उन्होंने उसे देखा....

source: 0430 Itania time. Cohren hated waking up this early. Mainly because it was his responsibility to wake everyone else up in his company. Silently stepping out of his bunk, he put on his combat fatigues, throwing on his assault vest, and packed up his belongings from his locker, being careful with a particular small box. He shoulded his rifle and put his helmet on a small hook connected to his belt. It had all its fixing, respirator, goggles, everything needed. After checking his ammo pouches, he quietly walked out of the barracks, mud and ice squelching under his boots.
target: 0430 इटानिया का समय। कोहरेन को इतना जल्दी जागना बिल्कुल पसंद नहीं था। मुख्यतः इसलिए, कि अपनी कंपनी में बाकी सब को जगाना उसकी ज़िम्मेदारी थी। बिना आवाज किए अपने बंक में से बाहर निकलकर उसने अपने लड़ाई के कपड़े पहने, कवच डाला और अपने लॉकर में से एक खास छोटे से बक्से का ध्यान रखते हुए अपना सामान बांधा। उसने अपनी राइफल कंधे पर ली और हेलमेट को पट्टे से जुड़े एक छोटे हूक पर लगाया। इसमें उसकी ज़रूरत की सभी चीज़ें थी, फिक्सिंग, रेस्पिरेटर, गोगल्स। अपने गोलियों के पाउच को जाँचने के बाद वह बिना आवाज़ किए बराक से बाहर निकला, कीचड़ और बर्फ अपने बूट के तले कुचलते हुए।

source: He took a lighter from his jacket pocket and a cig from the other. Lighting it, he took a small drag before opening the door slightly. Over the last week he had to get creative when waking the men and women under his command. He stopped using the preset wake up alarm, half the time it never worked, when all that came from the speakers was a light hiss.
target: उसने अपनी जैकेट की जेब से एक लाइटर और दूसरी से सिगरेट निकाली। उसे जलाते हुए उसने दरवाज़े को ज़रा सा खोलने से पहले एक छोट कश लिया। पिछले एक हफ्ते के दौरान उसे अपने अधीन के पुरुषों और महिलाओं को जगाते वक्त कुछ नया करना पड़ा था। उसने प्रीसेट वेकअप अलार्म इस्तेमाल करना बंद कर दिया था, आधा वक्त वह काम नहीं करता था, क्योंकि स्पीकर से बस एक हल्की सिसकार सुनाई देती थी।

source: “Waking them up” Cohren turned to see 2nd Lieutenant Nemic walking up.
target: “उनको जगाने के बाद” कोहरेन पलटा तो उसने सेकेंड लेफ्टेनेन्ट नेमिक को अपनी तरफ आते हुए देखा।

source: Before he could answer, the door opened and Harris, Craith, and a few others hurried out, already fully dressed and kitted out.
target: वह जवाब दे पाए उससे पहले दरवाज़ा खुला और हेरिस, क्रैथ और कुछ अन्य लोग पूरी तरह से तैयार और अपना किट लगाए हुए जल्दी से बाहर निकले।

source: “Yes sir. There should be on their way now, we gave them time to grab rations from the mess” 	At 0500 sharp, Exodus company assembled at the motor pool. Shaw stepped onto a box and began to speak.
target: "जी हाँ सर। वे अब अपने रास्ते पे होंगे, हमने उनको मेस से राशन लेने के लिए समय दिया था"

source: “Where are moving out to FOB I-131, fifty miles outside of Ianlos. We are to support the ongoing siege and later attack of Ianlos to flush out the insurgency there. From there we will have a foothold and the base of the mountains” Shaw explained. “Get with your squads and mount up”
target: "हम लैनलोस से पचास मील बाहर, एफओबी I-131 की ओर जा रहे हैं," शॉ ने समझाया। "हमारा मिशन विद्रोहियों को बाहर खदेड़ने के लिए लानलोस पर चल रही घेराबंदी और उसके बाद के हमले में मदद करना है। वहां से, हम पहाड़ों की तलहटी पर कब्ज़ा करेंगे। अपने दस्तों के साथ आगे बढ़ें।"

source: The company dispersed, joining together in their squads and their sergeants had them mount up on one of the tanks. Cohren pulled himself onto one of the tanks farther up on the convoy, joining Nemic, Craith, and two new recruits. Cohren remembered them arriving a few days ago, but didn’t know much about them. Sitting on the side, dangling his legs on the side, he adjusted his pack and radio set, which connected to his earpiece and throat mic.
target: जैसे ही उनके सार्जेंट ने उन्हें टैंकों पर चढ़ने का निर्देश दिया, कंपनी तितर-बितर हो गई, अपने दस्तों में इकट्ठा हो गई। कोहरेन नेमिक, क्रेथ और दो नए रंगरूटों के साथ जुड़कर काफिले में आगे एक टैंक पर चढ़ गए। कोहरेन को याद आया कि वे कुछ ही दिन पहले शामिल हुए थे, लेकिन उसे उनके बारे में बहुत कम पता था। अपने पैर लटकाकर एक तरफ बैठकर, उसने अपना पैक और रेडियो सेट एडजस्ट किया, जो उसके ईयरपीस और गले के माइक से जुड़ा था।

source: “Hey Cohren, does Harris still have Snowball?” Nemic asks as they got settled in.
target: "अरे कोहरेन, क्या हैरीस के पास अभी भी स्नोबॉल है?" बैठते समय नेमिक ने पूछा।

source: “You mean his chicken he stole?” Cohren remembered the morning they had stolen him from a farm. “Yeah, i'm pretty sure”
target: "तुम्हारा मतलब उस मुर्गे से है जिसे उसने चुराया था?," कोहरेन ने उस सुबह को याद किया जब उन्होंने उसे एक खेत से लिया था। "हाँ, मुझे पूरा यकीन है"

source: Cohren glanced over to one of the other tanks and spotted Harris with his squad. From the back of his pack he could just make out the movement of a small chicken moving its head around, scanning the surroundings.
target: कोहरेन ने दूसरे टैंक पर नज़र डाली और हैरिस को अपने दस्ते के साथ देखा। अपने पैक के पीछे से झांकते हुए उसने एक छोटे मुर्गे को अपना सिर इधर-उधर घुमाते और आस-पास अपनी नज़र दौड़ाते हुए देखा।

source: “Yup, he still has him” Cohren answered as the tank's turret hatch clanked open and its commander came into view.
target: "हाँ, वह अभी भी उसके पास है," कोहरेन ने उत्तर दिया। उसी समय टैंक का बुर्ज हैच खुला और कमांडर सामने आया।

source: “All tanks were moving out” The commander started calmly but clearly into his headset. The engines of a platoon of tanks and Strykers roared to life as they started moving forward. The Kronos Cohren was on jolted as its break released and moved forward, getting into formation. The tanks took up a wedge formation as they moved across the Itania plains. The winter storms had frozen over the wetlands and forests, but the mud always remained.
target: "सभी टैंक, आगे बढ़ें," कमांडर ने शांति से लेकिन स्पष्ट रूप से अपने हेडसेट में कहा। जैसे ही वे आगे बढ़ने लगे, टैंकों और स्ट्राइकरों की पलटन के इंजन चालू हो गए। कोहरेन के क्रोनोस टैंक ने ब्रेक रिलीज होते ही झटका खाया और वह फॉर्मेशन में चला गया। टैंकों ने इटानिया मैदानों में आगे बढ़ते हुए एक पच्चर का निर्माण किया। सर्दियों के तूफानों के कारण आर्द्रभूमियों और जंगलों पर बर्फ जम गई थी, लेकिन कीचड़ हमेशा मौजूद था।

source: After around an hour, one of the new recruits, Cohren, remembered his name being Orson, spoke up. “Lieutenant, you’ve been here since the start of the war, right?”
target: लगभग एक घंटे बाद, नए रंगरूटों में से एक बोला, "लेफ्टिनेंट, आप युद्ध की शुरुआत से ही यहां हैं, है ना?" कोहरेन को याद आया कि उसका नाम ऑरसन था।

source: “Yup, Operation Firestorm,” Cohren answered. “We thought it would be over in a few weeks, but…we underestimate them”
target: "हाँ, ऑपरेशन फायरस्टॉर्म," कोहरेन ने जवाब दिया। "हमें लगा था कि वह कुछ सप्ताह में खत्म हो जाएगा, लेकिन... हम गलत थे"

source: The advancement of Humanity never ceased, even for a moment–during difficult times we grow and adapt once again. The cities are as prosperous as ever, and our technological advancement is rising. With our recent discovery of Ignniat, humanity has once skyrocketed past its peak; the greatest has yet to be achieved. This grace of newfound knowledge could only be described as divine intervention - we humanity will be able to grace the gods with our presence in their land in the clouds. Everyone within the company of Karascene has evaluated Ignniat and we sense a large potential within this mineral – worry not, Ignniat has not been evaluated to have any side effects or downsides of being mined, it has a higher chance to–
target: Framþróun mannkynsins hætti aldrei, jafnvel um stund – á erfiðum tímum þroskumst við og aðlöguðumst aftur. Borgirnar eru jafn velmegandi og áður, og tækniframfarir okkar eru að aukast. Með nýlegri uppgötvun okkar á Ignniat hefur mannkynið einu sinni rokið fram úr hámarki sínu; það mesta hefur enn ekki náðst. Þessari náð nýfundinnar þekkingar væri aðeins hægt að lýsa sem guðlegri íhlutun – við mannkynið munum geta náð guðunum með nærveru okkar í landi þeirra í skýjunum. Allir innan fyrirtækisins Karascene hafa metið Ignniat og við skynjum mikla möguleika innan þessa steinefnis – áhyggjur ekki, Ignniat hefur ekki verið metið að hafa neinar aukaverkanir eða galla við námuvinnslu, það hefur meiri möguleika á að

source: A click. It had been reruns of this same stream, the day the world was ruined. Dad always found himself turning the channel off when I was unable to tear my eyes away. The somber face he gave me ensured a gut-wrenching feeling transpiring from deep within – I always feel bad when it plays, but it opens the floodgates to so many memories; granted they weren't very good ones. Letting out a sigh, I slowly rose to my feet, gotta get my mind off things. His saddened mood remained, and regularly I’d try to help ease his mood and at least give him a little bit of joy, but today; I’m tired.
target: Það höfðu verið endursýningar á þessu sama streymi, daginn sem heimurinn var eyðilagður. Pabbi var alltaf að slökkva á rásinni þegar ég gat ekki slitið af mér augun. Þunglamalegt andlitið sem hann gaf mér tryggði þrúgandi tilfinningu djúpt innan frá – mér líður alltaf illa þegar það spilar en það opnar flóðgáttirnar fyrir svo mörgum minningum; enda voru þær ekki mjög góðar. Ég andvarpaði og reis hægt og rólega á fætur. Ég verð að hætta að hugsa um hlutina. Sorglegt skap hans hélst, og reglulega myndi ég reyna að létta skap hans og að minnsta kosti gefa honum smá gleði, en í dag er ég þreyttur.

source: I hold a relatively slow pace as I approach the door, giving a small holler to Dad. “I’ll be heading out for a bit, dinner is in the fridge.” No response. Figures. He usually hears me though, he’ll probably be fine. Slowly closing the door behind me, I let another breathy sigh escape as the door completely shut. Nearly forgetting, I place my hand on the cold, metallic scanner that locks the door. If there was anything this apartment had, it was advanced tech, but then again; most places had notable technology–it had been a long time since anyone had used any other different technology.
target: Ég held frekar hægum hraða þegar ég nálgast dyrnar og læt pabba heyra það. „Ég ætla að fara út í smá stund, kvöldmaturinn er í ísskápnum.“ Ekkert svar. Tölur. Hann heyrir mig þó yfirleitt, hann mun líklega vera í lagi. Ég lokaði hurðinni hægt og rólega á eftir mér og lét annað andvarp sleppa út þegar hurðin lokaðist. Það gleymist næstum að ég legg höndina á kaldan málmskannann sem læsir hurðinni. Ef það var eitthvað sem þessi íbúð hafði, þá var það háþróuð tækni, en svo aftur; flestir staðir höfðu eftirtektarverða tækni – það hafði verið langt síðan einhver hafði notað aðra aðra tækni.

source: The cold, rainy night ensued my long overdue walk–exploring the city of Paltricus was a privilege to those who’d been safe from the mutation via escape, or pure luck. The city night was beautiful, illuminated with vibrant stars that remained for thousands of years. It must be lonely in the great distant sky. Paltricus was a nice place, but it felt more like a cage than a luxurious place of living. Filled to the brim with apartments, homes, and any other building able to hold occupants, most buildings were hundreds of stories tall; thanks to Ignniat. The mineral that appeased technology, and architecture was a great mineral that extended our foundation of life. Public knowledge only knows so much about this mineral though, mainly because mainly because it’s kept under pretty tough wraps.
target: Kalda, rigningarríka nóttin kom í kjölfarið á löngu tímabærri göngu minni – að skoða borgina Paltricus var forréttindi fyrir þá sem höfðu verið öruggir fyrir stökkbreytingunni með flótta, eða hreinni heppni. Borgarnóttin var falleg, upplýst með lifandi stjörnum sem héldust í þúsundir ára. Það hlýtur að vera einmanalegt á hinum mikla fjarlæga himni. Paltricus var góður staður, en það var meira eins og búr en lúxus staður til að búa. Fullar af íbúðum, heimilum og öllum öðrum byggingum sem rúmuðu íbúa voru flestar byggingar mörg hundruð hæða háar; þökk sé Ignniat. Steinefnið sem friðþægði tæknina og arkitektúrinn var frábært steinefni sem jók undirstöðu lífs okkar. Almenn þekking veit aðeins svo mikið um þetta steinefni þó, aðallega vegna þess að það er haldið undir frekar erfiðum umbúðum.

source: Removing myself from clouded thoughts, I found my way to my favorite coffee spot; most people avoid it because rumors were spread that a lapse was found in the area, which was what society has referred to those whom the virus has infected. This never really disturbed me, I’ve had incredible luck my entire life, plus the owner is a great guy. Who would pass up free coffee in exchange for talks and chats late at night?
target: Þegar ég fjarlægði mig úr skýjuðum hugsunum fann ég mína leið á uppáhalds kaffistaðinn minn; flestir forðast það vegna þess að sögusagnir bárust um að glötun væri að finna á svæðinu, sem er það sem samfélagið hefur vísað til þeirra sem veiran hefur smitað. Þetta hefur aldrei truflað mig, ég hef haft ótrúlega heppni allt mitt líf, auk þess sem eigandinn er frábær strákur. Hver myndi sleppa ókeypis kaffi í skiptum fyrir samræður og spjall seint á kvöldin?

source: Walking inside, a loud ring dispelled my discomfort as the aroma of freshly brewed coffee filled my lungs. Anton, the man who owned the store, was of course the person behind the counter – the place was practically empty except for a few people in the back. Approaching the counter, my feet tired from a long walk, I droop atop one of the stools and yawn. I spot Anton bringing the regular thankfully. “Hey Lilith, Long night?” his raspy voice echoed within the fractals of my brain, “Something of the sort,” I replied shallowly, more tired and tired by the second.
target: Þegar ég gekk inn eyddi hávær hringur óþægindum mínum á meðan ilmurinn af nýlöguðu kaffi fyllti lungun. Anton, maðurinn sem átti verslunina, var auðvitað maðurinn á bak við afgreiðsluborðið – staðurinn var nánast tómur fyrir utan nokkra í bakhliðinni. Þegar ég nálgast afgreiðsluborðið, þreyttur á fótunum eftir langan göngutúr, sef ég ofan á einn kollinn og geispa. Ég sé Anton koma þakklátan með regluna. „Heyrðu Lilith, langa nótt?“ hvöss rödd hans bergmálaði innan heilabrota minna: „Eitthvað af því tagi,“ svaraði ég grunnt, þreyttari og þreyttari eftir því sem á leið.

source: Ready to fix my fatigue, I took a few sips of the coffee placed in front of me. “Business still down since that sighting..?” I spoke quietly, not attempting to scare away the remaining customers that Anton’s unit had. He nodded, cleaning a glass with a rag – this place is technically a bar, but I never really came for drinks. A few murmurs could be heard from behind, but for the most part, the conversation between me and Anton was held rather short tonight. Waving him a small goodbye, I left the shop; with a little more energy than before.
target: Tilbúinn til að laga þreytuna tók ég nokkra sopa af kaffinu sem sett var fyrir framan mig. „Viðskiptin liggja enn niðri síðan ég sá þetta...“ Ég talaði hljóðlega og reyndi ekki að hræða burt þá viðskiptavini sem Anton hafði. Hann kinkaði kolli og hreinsaði glas með tusku – þessi staður er tæknilega séð bar, en ég fékk mér aldrei drykk. Nokkrar möglur heyrðust aftan frá en að mestu leyti var samtal okkar Antons frekar stutt í kvöld. Ég veifaði honum smá kveðjustund og yfirgaf búðina með aðeins meiri orku en áður.

source: Wandering the dark streets late at night wasn’t usually the best option, but honestly, it was better than staying in that stuffy apartment; hell most of the time you could hear the neighbors having sex more than you could hear your music. With a quick, breathy sigh, I returned my gaze to the walk ahead–I’ll probably make my way towards Al’s Pawnshop; just a place I find junk that looks interesting, as a pastime. Quick regret flushed over me as I heard footsteps close behind, maybe I'm overthinking it, but nobody hung around this place unless they wanted to get mugged, or beaten up. It was popular for its mafia and gang activities…
target: Ráfandi um dimmar götur seint á kvöldin var yfirleitt ekki besti kosturinn, en heiðarlega var það betra en að vera í þessari troðfullu íbúð; helvíti mest af þeim tíma sem þú gætir heyrt nágrannana stunda kynlíf meira en þú gætir heyrt tónlistina þína. Með snöggu andvarpi sneri ég aftur augnaráði mínu til göngunnar framundan – ég mun líklega leggja leið mína í átt að Al’s Pawnshop; bara stað sem ég finn drasl sem lítur út fyrir að vera áhugavert, sem dægradvöl. Fljótt rann eftirsjá yfir mig þegar ég heyrði fótatak nálægt, kannski er ég að ofhugsa það, en enginn hékk á þessum stað nema þeir vildu láta handrukka sig eða berja sig. Það var vinsælt fyrir mafíu sína og klíku starfsemi

source: Stealthily I made my way towards the back of the store, murmurs and talking heard beyond a metal grate which took a few yanks to tear off. Climbing into the vent was the safest and quietest option for me right now; climbing my way through, I’d pick up on conversations and talks between strangely dressed men. I noticed Al inside, chained. Figures he’d get caught eventually.
target: Ég fór laumulega í átt að bakhlið verslunarinnar, mögl og tal heyrðist handan við málmgrind sem tók nokkra yanka að rífa af. Að klifra inn í loftopið var öruggasti og hljóðlátasti kosturinn fyrir mig núna; klifra mig í gegnum, ég myndi taka upp á samtölum og viðræðum milli undarlega klæddra manna. Ég tók eftir Al inni, hlekkjaður. Tölur sem hann myndi ná á endanum.

source: Alborn was a great guy, but this looked serious. No need to stick my nose out for someone, especially when they seem like they’ve just gotten into trouble with every authority in the city. Yet, I still couldn’t shake the feeling. Letting a silent sigh escape me, I slowly warped off the grate below, dropping down into the quiet room. “Psst. Al. Al!” I whispered, giving a soft yell at his lack of response. “Lilith? What are you doing here..? You’ve gotta leave, he’ll catch you.”
target: Alborn var frábær strákur en þetta leit alvarlega út. Engin þörf á að reka út nefið fyrir einhverjum, sérstaklega þegar þeir virðast bara hafa lent í vandræðum með öllum yfirvöldum í borginni. Samt gat ég ekki hrist af mér tilfinninguna. Ég forðaði mér frá hljóðlausu andvarpi, hvarf hægt af grindinni fyrir neðan og datt niður í hljóðláta herbergið. „Psst. Al!“ hvíslaði ég og öskraði mjúklega yfir viðbragðsleysi hans. „Lilith, hvað ertu að gera hér..? Þú verður að fara, hann grípur þig.”

source: No shit, I silently voiced to myself. Attempting to lockpick the chains that wrapped around his arms, voices closed in on our location, the faint footsteps growing ever louder. “Quick! Get back in the vent, and leave. Do not come back. If we meet again, it won’t be in this city.” He said hurriedly, the flash of panic on his face didn’t help my nerves at all. Listening to his advice. I couldn’t bring myself to stay longer. Fuck, Al. I quickly ran for it after exiting the vent; it hurt a bit to lose such an invaluable friend. Were they moving him to the…other city? So many things were flicking through my slightly scattered mind, and most of them were angry but sad. I’d done numerous kinds of research on the outer cities, and the capital of the infected, Alcatraz, which they named after the prison – felt like it fit the name pretty well from what I’d read. Not to mention the unmutated had cut any remaining connecting land with infected land, it was…tragic.
target: Ekkert rugl, talaði ég þegjandi við sjálfan mig. Reyndi að læsa keðjunum sem vafðust utan um handleggi hans, raddir lokuðust inni á staðsetningu okkar, dauft fótatakið varð sífellt háværara. „Fljótt, farðu aftur inn í loftrýmið og farðu. Komdu ekki aftur, ef við hittumst aftur, þá verður það ekki í þessari borg.“ Hann sagði í flýti, skelfingarglampinn í andliti hans hjálpaði mér ekki neitt. Hlustaði á ráðleggingar hans. Ég gat ekki fengið mig til að vera lengur. Fjandinn, Al. Ég hljóp fljótt eftir því eftir að hafa farið út úr loftræstingunni; það var svolítið sárt að missa svona ómetanlegan vin. Voru þeir að flytja hann í aðra borg? Svo margt flökti í gegnum svolítið dreifðan huga minn og flest af því var reitt en sorglegt. Ég hafði gert fjölmargar tegundir rannsókna á ytri borgum, og höfuðborg sýktra, Alcatraz, sem þeir nefndu eftir fangelsinu – fannst eins og það passaði nafnið nokkuð vel frá því sem ég hafði lesið. Svo ekki sé minnst á að hinir óstökkbreyttu höfðu skorið allt tengiland sem eftir var við sýkt land, það var… sorglegt.

source: The walk home was quiet, but so loud. The thoughts infecting my brain were booming, and the regret of not having stayed to help flashed over multiple times. I finally arrived home, almost brought to tears by the dreadful walk in the burst of sounds from the clouds above, the thunderous booms were enough to frighten any person sometimes. Dad was already passed out on the couch, some rerun of an older movie, probably 10-12 years old; sighing, I quietly crept my way back to my room. Flopping in the bed, I wasn’t able to keep my eyes open for long. Before long, slumber crept up on me.
target: Gangan heim var róleg, en svo hávær. Hugsanirnar sem smituðu heilann minn voru í miklum uppgangi og eftirsjáin yfir því að hafa ekki verið til hjálpar flögraði yfir mörgum sinnum. Loksins kom ég heim, næstum tárvotur eftir hræðilega göngutúrinn í hrinu hljóðanna úr skýjunum fyrir ofan, dynjandi hvellirnir voru nóg til að hræða nokkurn mann stundum. Pabbi var þegar látinn í sófanum, endursýning á eldri mynd, líklega 10-12 ára gamall. Andvarpandi læddist ég hljóðlega aftur inn í herbergið mitt. Flopping í rúminu, ég var ekki fær um að halda augunum opnum lengi. Áður en langt um leið læddist blundur að mér.

source: The days rolled past before I could even realize it. It was a few days since Alborn was taken away – to where I had no clue, but I knew he was taken somewhere. Those outfits seemed familiar, but no way was I going to figure it out on the first try. Sighing, I placed my hands on the system in front of me, emanating a red and purple glow – I could hack the security, the place isn’t far, and I doubt they took measures...Maybe I shouldn’t. Of course, against all morals, my fingers moved without my knowing, pulling up multiple screens; god I’m good. I was pretty popular on a couple of websites, they referred to me as “WRAITH.” Which was a pretty catchy name. Granted my name on any site is WR417H, but I like to think the public came up with it.
target: Dagarnir liðu áður en ég gat gert mér grein fyrir því. Það voru nokkrir dagar síðan Alborn var fluttur burt – þangað sem ég hafði ekki hugmynd um, en ég vissi að hann var fluttur einhvers staðar. Þessi föt virtust kunnugleg en ég gat ekki áttað mig á því í fyrstu tilraun. Andvarpandi lagði ég hendur mínar á kerfið fyrir framan mig, sem stafaði frá rauðum og fjólubláum bjarma – ég gæti hakkað öryggið, staðurinn er ekki langt, og ég efast um að þeir hafi gert ráðstafanir... Kannski ætti ég ekki að gera það. Auðvitað, gegn öllu siðferði, hreyfðust fingur mínir án þess að ég vissi, og drógu upp marga skjái; guð ég er góður. Ég var nokkuð vinsæll á nokkrum vefsíðum, þeir kölluðu mig „WRAITH.“ Sem var ansi grípandi nafn. Veitt nafn mitt á hvaða síðu sem er er WR417H, en ég held að almenningur hafi fundið það upp.

source: Moving the surveillance onto my mobile device, I watched each one intently. Nothing. It was like they were never there. That makes no sense. Cameras had tight security, even with remote access. How..? ARGH. I stood angrily, ready to remove some thoughts from my head – I made my way over, sliding on shoes and taking my keys. “I’ll be back soon, Dad.”Silence. Whatever, he didn’t usually respond, he was probably busy doing something more important than me anyway.
target: Með því að færa eftirlitið yfir í farsímann minn fylgdist ég grannt með hverjum og einum. Ekkert. Það var eins og þau væru aldrei þarna. Það er ekkert vit í því, myndavélar voru með stranga öryggisgæslu, jafnvel með fjaraðgangi. Hvernig..? ARGH. Ég stóð reiður, tilbúinn að fjarlægja hugsanir úr höfðinu á mér – ég fór yfir, renndi mér á skóm og tók lyklana mína. „Ég kem bráðum aftur, pabbi.“ Þögn. Hvað sem því leið svaraði hann yfirleitt ekki, hann var hvort eð er örugglega upptekinn við að gera eitthvað mikilvægara en ég.

source: With a quick jolt, I felt a shiver enthrall its way down my spine as I made my way out of the apartment; weird. Ignoring the feeling, I urged myself to head towards Al’s to investigate a little, but my legs moved towards Anton’s small bar – it was a pretty calm place, and I definitely needed to talk to someone. Who better than a bartender who owes you something?
target: Með snöggum kipp fann ég hroll streyma niður hrygginn á mér þegar ég gekk út úr íbúðinni; undarlegt. Þegar ég hunsaði tilfinninguna hvatti ég sjálfan mig til að halda í átt að Al til að rannsaka málið aðeins, en fæturnir hreyfðust í átt að litla barnum hans Antons – þetta var frekar rólegur staður og ég þurfti svo sannarlega að tala við einhvern. Hver er betri en barþjónn sem skuldar þér eitthvað?

source: Irregularly, Anton’s was pretty busy; it was bustling with activity and new faces that I’ve never seen before – Anton was regularly the only worker, so knowing that he must be pretty stressed. “Hey Barkeep, get me a coffee.” I purposely spoke in a lower tone to throw him off a bit, a small chuckle escaping me seeing his sigh of relief after turning quickly. “God, Lilith, don’t do that to me…” he softly let out, obviously tired. “You seem pretty busy…you need some help? Look’s like there's more than plenty of folks here.” I huffed out, I do not want to help with these drunks, but I feel bad making this guy work alone out here. “Could you? I’ll pay you after…” he uttered with the eyes of a puppy, aimed straight at me. Advanced War Tactics…
target: Óreglulega var Anton nokkuð upptekinn; iðaði af athafnasemi og nýjum andlitum sem ég hef aldrei séð áður – Anton var reglulega eini starfsmaðurinn, svo vitandi að hann hlýtur að vera ansi stressaður. „Heyrðu Barkeep, fáðu mér kaffi.“ Ég talaði viljandi í lægri tón til að slá hann aðeins út af laginu, lítið glott slapp undan mér þegar ég sá létti andvarp hans eftir að hafa snúist snöggt. „Guð, Lilith, gerðu mér það ekki…“ hleypti hann mjúklega út, augljóslega þreyttur. „Þú virðist ansi upptekinn… þú þarft hjálp? Útlit er eins og það sé meira en nóg af fólki hérna.“ Ég fussaði út, ég vil ekki hjálpa með þessum fyllibyttum, en mér líður illa með að láta þennan gaur vinna einn hérna úti. „Geturðu það? Ég skal borga þér eftir…“ sagði hann með augum hvolps og beindi augum beint að mér. Háþróuð stríðstaktík…

source: A burst of flames erupted from Thassalin's jaws as the colossal Thraki set fire to a very specific patch of forest, then circled above, watching for moment. Weirdly, as he had slowed down, the weird screaming noise from behind him had stopped. Thassalin had forgotten he had passengers on his back.
target: Eldtungur blossuðu upp úr kjálkum Þassalíns þegar hinn risavaxni Þrakí kveikti í mjög ákveðnum skógarbletti sem síðan hringsólaði fyrir ofan og hann fylgdist með um stundarsakir. Svo undarlega vildi til að þegar hann hafði hægt á sér hafði undarlegur, öskrandi hávaðinn aftan frá honum stöðvast. Thassalín hafði gleymt að hann var með farþega á bakinu.

source: "My own flight is very different from being abruptly dragged off by a massive, pink dragon!"
target: „Mitt eigið flug er mjög frábrugðið því að vera skyndilega dreginn burt af risastórum, bleikum dreka!“

source: Kayel clearly didn't agree with Nyssi, he looked less black than normal and his claws had dug into Thassalin's back to the point that he'd made the Thraki bleed, but Thassalin clearly didn't seem to care. That being said, Thassalin had realized he had scared his new friends and found a clearing to land in.
target: Kayel var greinilega ekki sammála Nyssi, hann leit síður út fyrir að vera svartur en venjulega og klærnar höfðu grafið sig í bakið á Þassalín þannig að honum hafði blætt úr Þrakí en Þassalín virtist greinilega vera alveg sama. Að því sögðu hafði Þassalín áttað sig á að hann hafði hrætt nýju vini sína og fundið rjóður til að lenda í.

source: "I APOLOGIZE BUT I PICKED UP A SCENT. I HAD TO DEAL WITH IT!"
target: „ÉG BIÐST AFSÖKUNAR EN ÉG FANN LYKT. ÉG VARÐ AÐ TAKAST Á VIÐ ÞETTA!“

source: "Did you have to drag us along as well?" Tenuk snapped as he climbed off Thassalin's back, sliding down his tail. "And we left Retvik behind! We abandoned our big, strong, fighty guy! How is he going to get to us?"
target: „Þurftirðu líka að draga okkur með?“ Tenuk snarsnerist þegar hann klifraði af baki Þassalíns og renndi sér niður eftir skottinu. „Við skildum Retvik eftir! Við yfirgáfum stóra, sterka og baráttuglaða manninn okkar! Hvernig kemst hann til okkar?“

source: "He'll work it out..." Nyssi tutted. "Retvik's slow but he's not stupid."
target: „Hann mun finna út úr því...“ Nyssi sagði. „Retvik er hægur en hann er ekki heimskur.“

source: Nyssi blinked and turned back to Tenuk. "Of course he can drive."
target: Nyssi blikkaði og sneri sér aftur til Tenuk. „Auðvitað má hann keyra.“

source: No, clearly not. The creature just hissed and tried to fly directly into Thassalin. Thankfully, despite his size, Thassalin was nimble enough to get out of the way, but Nyssi couldn't help but scream as she very nearly lost her grip on Thassalin's overly smooth scales.
target: Nei, greinilega ekki, skepnan hvæsti bara og reyndi að fljúga beint inn í Þassalín. Sem betur fer, þrátt fyrir stærð sína, var Thassalin nógu fimur til að komast í burtu, en Nyssi gat ekki annað en öskrað þegar hún missti næstum takið á of sléttum vogum Thassalins.

source: Thassalin hissed, then circled round, closer to the mountain he called home. The dark beast followed, but somewhat panicked as a blast of fire hit it from behind. The creature hadn't realised it was no longer alone. It panicked further as Thassalin slowed down then thwacked his tail into the side of the beast's head, knocking it off course.
target: Þassalín hvæsti og hringsólaði, nær fjallinu sem hann kallaði heimili sitt. Dökka dýrið fylgdi á eftir en varð nokkuð óttaslegið þegar eldsprenging skall aftan á því. Skepnan hafði ekki áttað sig á því að hún væri ekki lengur ein. Hann varð skelkaður enn frekar þegar Thassalin hægði á sér og rak skottið í hliðina á höfði dýrsins og sló það af leið.

source: Snarling and hissing, the creature flew upwards, spitting into the air. Everything suddenly went dark, as if the monster was sucking the light from the sky itself, replacing it with a cloud of perpetual night.
target: Snöktandi og hvæsandi flaug skepnan upp á við og hrækti út í loftið. Allt varð skyndilega dimmt, eins og skrímslið væri að sjúga ljósið af himninum sjálfum og skipta því út fyrir ský eilífrar nætur.

source: No longer able to see, Thassalin tried to retreat, but found himself scraping against the top of the treeline, before crashing into a clearing. The creature seemed to know exactly where Thassalin had fallen and headed straight for him, taking the dark cloud with it.
target: Þassalín var ekki lengur fær um að sjá, reyndi að hörfa, en fann sig skrapa við toppinn á trélínunni áður en hann rakst í rjóðrið. Skepnan virtist vita nákvæmlega hvar Þassalín hafði fallið og stefndi beint á hann og tók dökka skýið með sér.

source: "Kayel!" Tenuk exclaimed as he glided out of the cloud and began circling, trying to spot Nyssi and Thassalin in the darkness below. "What do we do? Kayel..? Kayel, where are you?"
target: „Kayel!“ hrópaði Tenuk þegar hann flaug út úr skýinu og byrjaði að hringsóla og reyndi að sjá Nyssi og Þassalín í myrkrinu fyrir neðan. „Hvað gerum við, Kayel... Kayel, hvar ertu?“

source: Below, Nyssi scrambled to her feet. She was pretty sure she had broken something, but her weird, unnatural healing powers had already kicked in. The same couldn't have been said for Thassalin, who was lying in a lump, resting against the one tree that hadn't collapsed under his weight. Nyssi did her best to try and reach Thassalin but she could barely see more than a couple of meters in front of her. Everything was pitch black and engulfed in unholy shadows. And in said shadows, something was screaming and screeching.
target: Þar fyrir neðan skreið Nyssi á fætur. Hún var nokkuð viss um að hún hefði brotið eitthvað, en undarlegur, óeðlilegur lækningamáttur hennar var þegar kominn í gang. Það sama hefði ekki verið hægt að segja um Þassalín sem lá í klessu og hvíldi sig upp við eina tréð sem ekki hafði hrunið undan þunga hans.
